ovdesc.p: The Payment Stop Type table allows the definition of up to 99 reasons for Payment Stop instructions (e.g Cheques Lost, Cheques Destroyed etc.).
The table is used by the PAYMENT.STOP Application to describe the reason for each Stop instruction.

desc.p: Imputable field . The charge code defined here can be any valid FT.CHARGE.TYPE or FT.COMMISSION.TYPE record with a flat amount . The charges linked to this record will get defaulted in PAYMENT. STOP table, if attached in the field PAYM.STOP.TYPE.
This is the code by which the Payment Stop Type details are known to the system.
1 or 2 numeric characters in the range 1-99. (Mandatory input)
